comments.body: I was trying to keep the field names aligned with what was defined in the manual schemas. So, not sure if we should change any other field names in this PR

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +48,52 @@    { "name": "SessionId", "type": "int32", "versions": "7+", "default": "0", "ignorable": false,
      "about": "The fetch session ID, or 0 if this is not part of a fetch session." },
    { "name": "Responses", "type": "[]FetchableTopicResponse", "versions": "0+",
      "about": "The response topics.", "fields": [
      { "name": "Topic", "type": "string", "versions": "0+", "entityType": "topicName",
